title: Implement NPS Calculator
description: Implement the NPS (National Pension System) calculator with current age, monthly investment, expected return, annuity rate. Shows corpus at 60, lumpsum withdrawal (60%), annuity (40%), and monthly pension. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Implement Lumpsum Calculator
description: Implement the Lumpsum calculator for one-time investments with investment amount, expected return, time period, and year-by-year growth breakdown. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Implement PPF Calculator
description: Implement the PPF (Public Provident Fund) calculator with yearly investment (₹500-₹1,50,000), 15-year minimum lock-in, government interest rate. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Implement SIP Calculator
description: Implement the SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) calculator with monthly investment inputs, expected return rate, time period, and year-by-year breakdown table. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Implement FD Calculator
description: Implement the FD (Fixed Deposit) calculator with principal, interest rate, tenure, and compounding frequency options (monthly, quarterly, half-yearly, yearly). See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Add step-up feature to SIP calculator
description: Add annual step-up (top-up) percentage option to SIP calculator. Step-up SIP increases the monthly investment by a fixed percentage each year, reflecting typical salary growth. Requires updating calculation logic to handle yearly increasing contributions and updating the UI with a step-up percentage input slider.

title: Implement EMI Calculator
description: Implement the EMI calculator for home, car, and personal loans with loan amount, interest rate, tenure inputs, and amortization schedule. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.
